Dulce de Leche
1 Tin sweetend condensed milk (or more)
  1. Put unopened tin on condensed milk in a saucepan, and cover well with water
  2. Be sure there's enough water to cover the tins throughout the whole process, topping up if necessary
  3. Bring to the boil, and simmer for about 2.5 hours (or longer/shorter darker/lighter caramel)
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
